verbose_text: At the severe end of the disease spectrum is a congenital disorder that affects corneal endothelial development by leading to a loss of endothelial cells (family BR1), whereas in the milder Czech families, focal multilayering of endothelial cells XREF_BIBR (XREF_FIG H) and cellular " epithelialization " with increased expression of several epithelial keratins, predominantly KRT7 and KRT19, are characteristic of the disease.
evidence: expression of several epithelial keratins, predominantly KRT7 and KRT19
